A

add_Bills(int) - Method in class Model.Player.Player
transformer(mutative): It adds the intrger b to the Players Bills
postcondition:the b is added to the Bills of the Player.
add_Jackpot(Player, Player, int) - Static method in class Model.Player.Jackpot
Observer: Adds the amount of Money(j) to the Jackpot
pre-condition: j > 0 post-condition: Removes the amount of Money(j) from the Money of the Player P1 and then puts it to the Jackpot
add_Loan(int) - Method in class Model.Player.Player
transformer(mutative): It adds the intrger l to the Players Loan
postcondition:the l is added to the Loan of the Player.
add_Money(int) - Method in class Model.Player.Player
transformer(mutative): It adds the intrger m to the players Money
postcondition:the m is added to the Money of the Player.
Advertisement - Class in Model.Card
This class represents the Mail Card Advertisement
Advertisement(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Model.Card.Advertisement
Constructor: Constructs a new Advertisement Card with the given name, message, Image and choice.
